j.io

Class ChunkedInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.FilterInputStream
        • j.io.ChunkedInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class ChunkedInputStream
extends java.io.FilterInputStream
    Represents an HTTP chunked input stream. This class is not thread-safe.

      • getTrailingHeaders

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTrailingHeaders()
        Gets the trailing headers that appear after the last chunk.
        Returns:
        Before the last chunk is read, returns null. After the last chunk is read, i.e., read() returns -1, returns an unmodifiable list of headers which can be empty if there is none.
